abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Emergency Public
            Service Delivery Project in the Republic of Guinea-Bissau is
            to contribute to uninterrupted delivery of critical public
            services through the provision of resources for payment of
            teachers' salaries. The Bank support for this project
            is part of a multi-faceted effort by the international
            community to help reduce the fragility of the economy and
            the state. The approach aims to develop a strategic platform
            based on three pillars: (i) satisfactory macroeconomic
            program and improved fiscal stability; (ii) stimulating
            growth; and (iii) alleviating poverty. The project aims to
            ensure that educational services are maintained in 2008,
            paving the way for more substantial support in 2009, beyond
            that to be provided under the Education for All-Fast Track
            Initiative (EFA-FTI).
